mapper.insert: insert into pool (pool_owner, pool_number, pool_addr, pool_tel, mem_seq, pool_auth, pool_name, pool_time, pool_shower, pool_large, pool_parking) values(#{pool_owner}, #{pool_number}, #{pool_addr}, #{pool_tel}, #{mem_seq}, 0, #{pool_name}, #{pool_time}, #{pool_shower}, #{pool_large}, #{pool_parking})
